gen:link.msg:message: `ContingentLiabilities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ContingentLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ContingentLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfContingentLiabilitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfContingentLiabilitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfContingentLiabilitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesContingentLiabilitiesBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfContingentLiabilitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
